review.reviewBody: They gave me an extra piece of chicken! Whoooo!!
Really small pieces of chicken!  Also the price this restaurant charges is double other KFCs.  forgot popcorn chicken too
The salads are the smallest I have ever seen. Food is freezing.
4 PIECE CHICKEN BOX. Chicken was old, cold and greasy

We got  10 PIECE BUCKET AND 3 LARGE SIDES. The chicken was soggy. The gravy was not the usual KFC gravy; it tasted like packaged beef gravy. The corn was plain unseasoned corn. We were very dissatisfied. KFC is usually one of my favorites. I will not order from this location again.
